mapper.select: select username, password, authority from userinfo where username = #{username}
select count(username) from userinfo where username like concat(#{username}, '%')

select u.username, u.password, c.cpname authority, date_format(u.modifytime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifytime from userinfo u left join cpinfo c on u.authority = c.cpid where u.username like concat(#{username}, '%') order by u.modifytime desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (username, password, authority) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{authority})
mapper.update: update userinfo set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
